 - data mining of https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9397491/
 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Load necessary libraries

```{r}

library(Seurat)
library(SeuratDisk)
library(Matrix)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

```

# Set theme

```{r}

theme_set(
  theme_bw(20) +
    theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.border = element_rect(colour="black", fill = NA, size = 1),
          axis.text = element_text(colour="black"),
          axis.ticks = element_line(colour="black"),
          axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0),
          legend.title = element_text(size = 10),
          legend.text = element_text(size = 7)))

```

# Read in RDS

```{r}

no_platelet_eryth_doublet <- readRDS("../saved_data/cell_type_filtered_rereduced.rds")

```


# Read in reference to use for mapping

```{r}

reference <- LoadH5Seurat("../raw_data/pbmc_multimodal.h5seurat")

```

# Re-do mapping with filtered Seurat

```{r}

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(
  reference = reference,
  query = no_platelet_eryth_doublet,
  normalization.method = "SCT",
  reference.reduction = "pca",
  dims = 1:50
)

no_platelet_eryth_doublet <- MapQuery(
  anchorset = anchors,
  query = no_platelet_eryth_doublet,
  reference = reference,
  refdata = list(
    celltype.l1 = "celltype.l1",
    celltype.l2 = "celltype.l2",
    predicted_ADT = "ADT"
  ),
  reference.reduction = "pca", 
  reduction.model = "wnn.umap"
)

```

# Plot mapping results of filtered Seurat

```{r}

p1 = DimPlot(no_platelet_eryth_doublet, reduction = "umap", group.by = "predicted.celltype.l1", label = TRUE, label.size = 3, repel = TRUE) + NoLegend()

p2 = DimPlot(no_platelet_eryth_doublet, reduction = "umap", group.by = "predicted.celltype.l2", label = TRUE, label.size = 3 , repel = TRUE) + NoLegend()

p1 + p2

```

# Save RDS

```{r}

saveRDS(no_platelet_eryth_doublet, "../saved_data/almost_final_seurat.rds")

```
